Beat in Love (2018):
Readyyy! is Sega's male idol training smartphone game. Within it is a 2-unit group called La-Veritta. This is their official music video for their Beat in Love song. La-Veritta is the fourth unit that received a MV.

(Source: Readyyy Project Wikia)
